rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample lighting, designed to capture the positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Spacious and modern living area with large windows facing east for morning sunlight and a view of the central courtyard/garden.
Adjacent to the living room for convenience, with seating arrangements that encourage family interaction and social gatherings.
Modern kitchen layout featuring an open-plan design with counters facing the entrance for ease of access. Vastu principles ensure proper placement to enhance prosperity.
A private sanctuary located towards the north-east corner for optimal energy flow and relaxation.
Small bedroom with ample natural light from east-facing windows to invite positive vibes.
Functional bathroom attached to the master and guest bedrooms. Designed with proper ventilation and natural lighting as per Vastu guidelines.
An open-air courtyard that serves as a green lung, enhancing the overall energy of the cottage. Incorporates water features and garden space to adhere to Vastu.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize sunlight and provide a connection with the garden.
Primary door opening ensuring smooth energy flow into the home.

rooms.description: A convertible loft space for a home office or additional relaxation area designed to maintain the positive flow of energy.
Modern rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, featuring seating and greenery. Designed with Vastu principles to encourage clarity and relaxation.

openings.description: A staircase designed to provide easy access while ensuring proper circulation of energy between floors.

additional_info.garden_area: Large garden integrated with the central courtyard
